structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Computation of benefits of member who has an account with another state system.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 61.680 are hereby recognized and shall be followed in computing benefits of any member of the Teachers' Retirement System who also has an account with the Kentucky Employees Retirement System, County Employees Retirement System, or State Police Retirement System.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 528, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 38, effective March 26, 1974.
